'''Jocund Letters''' is a [[Gadget]] obtained during the [[Summertide Scales and Tales]] event by collecting 75 [[Excerpts of Bliss]]. Upon activation, the Jocund Letters will reveal all nearby Excerpts of Bliss including [[Jubilant Feather]]s, [[Fairytale Trove]]s, and [[Hero's Journey]]. The gadget has a 10-second cooldown between uses.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Jocund Letters is replaced by [[Joyous Letters]] upon redeeming the 200 Excerpts of Bliss.<!--
* The message "All Excerpts of Bliss have been marked" will appear if the Jocund Letters is activated when all Jocund Letters in the area have been obtained. The {{Tx}} cooldown will also still persist when the gadget is activated.
-->
